meta.title: Best Dogs for Austin, Texas Living
meta.description: Living in Austin? Here are the best dog breeds for the climate and lifestyle.

intro: Austin is one of the most dog-friendly cities in the US, but the heat can be tough on some breeds.

top_breeds_for_city.name: Golden Retriever
top_breeds_for_city.reason: Great for the many parks and swimming spots like Barton Springs.

top_breeds_for_city.name: Vizsla
top_breeds_for_city.reason: Handles the heat well and loves the active lifestyle.

local_tips.title: Watch the Heat
local_tips.content: Pavement gets hot quickly. Walk early in the morning during summer.

local_tips.title: Leash Laws
local_tips.content: Most parks require leashes, but there are designated off-leash areas.
